lines.text: It's the kid from the spaceship. Get him off the car.
[After Sam rescues Andrew by shooting him]

[musingly]
I can't believe you shot me.
Well, what would you have done?

[nonchalant]
Oh, I'd have shot you, of course.
So if the two of you are being shot at, which bullet do I take?
Why you must try for both, of course.
